title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedder inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); folders, personas, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete with native Ruby blocks.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around the ollama binary; syntax highlighting, history, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & persistent storage support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama; native binaries for macOS, Linux, Windows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint; quick testing & CI scripts.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain; ingest PDFs and chat locally.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support, GPU off-loading.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama REST API; static binary, async HTTP, zero-dependency deployment.

title: ollama-crystal
summary: Crystal shard for Ollama; fully typed client, websocket streaming, shard.yml install.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; tokio-based async client, serde models, examples.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go SDK for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list, embed with native Go structs.
